statements: SELECT * FROM candidate_tags;
SELECT candidate_id, skill_tag, experience_tag FROM candidate_tags;
SELECT * FROM candidate_tags WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT role_tag, candidate_id FROM candidate_tags WHERE skill_tag = 'Python';
SELECT skill_tag FROM candidate_tags ORDER BY experience_tag DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_tags WHERE skill_tag = 'Java' AND role_tag = 'Developer';
SELECT candidate_id, skill_tag FROM candidate_tags WHERE experience_tag = 'Intermediate';
SELECT DISTINCT skill_tag FROM candidate_tags WHERE role_tag = 'Manager' ORDER BY skill_tag ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, skill_tag, experience_tag FROM candidate_tags WHERE role_tag = 'Engineer' ORDER BY experience_tag DESC, candidate_id ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM candidate_tags GROUP BY candidate_id HAVING tag_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM candidate_tags WHERE skill_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT name, skill_level FROM candidate_tags WHERE years_of_experience > 3;
SELECT id, name FROM role_tags WHERE suitability_level >= 2 ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM role_tags WHERE skill_required = 'SQL' ORDER BY suitability_level DESC;
SELECT id, role_name, suitability_level FROM role_tags WHERE skill_required = 'Python';
SELECT name, skill_level FROM candidate_tags WHERE skill_level > 3 ORDER BY skill_level DESC
SELECT role_name, skill_required, suitability_level FROM role_tags WHERE suitability_level >= 5 ORDER BY role_name
SELECT name, skill_level, years_of_experience FROM candidate_tags WHERE years_of_experience < 3 OR skill_level > 2 ORDER BY years_of_experience
SELECT role_name, skill_required FROM role_tags WHERE skill_required = 'Java' AND suitability_level > 3 ORDER BY role_name, suitability_level DESC
SELECT name, skill_level FROM candidate_tags WHERE skill_level < 4 OR years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY name
SELECT id, name, email, skills FROM candidates;
SELECT name, email FROM candidates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM candidates WHERE skills @> '[{"skill": "Python"}]';
SELECT name FROM candidates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM candidates WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE skills @> '["Java", "Python"]';
SELECT id, name FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Candidates;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Candidates ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, first_name, skills FROM Candidates WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Tags WHERE tag_name IN ('Java', 'Python', 'SQL');
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM Roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Candidates ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, first_name, last_name FROM Candidates WHERE skills @> '{"language": "Java"}' AND skills @> '{"experience": "Intermediate"}';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, t.tag_name FROM Candidates c JOIN CandidateTags ct ON c.candidate_id = ct.candidate_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'Backend';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, r.role_name FROM Candidates c JOIN Roles r ON c.first_name ILIKE '%' || r.role_name || '%' OR c.last_name ILIKE '%' || r.role_name || '%';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, t.tag_name, r.role_name FROM Candidates c JOIN CandidateTags ct ON c.candidate_id = ct.candidate_id JOIN Tags t ON ct.tag_id = t.tag_id JOIN Roles r ON c.first_name ILIKE '%' || r.role_name || '%' OR c.last_name ILIKE '%' || r.role_name || '%' WHERE t.tag_name = 'Frontend';
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT id, name, email FROM candidates;
SELECT skills, experience_years FROM candidates WHERE experience_years > 3;
SELECT id, role_name, required_skills FROM roles WHERE min_experience_years <= 5 AND min_suitability_score >= 0.6;
SELECT role_name, max_experience_years, min_suitability_score FROM roles ORDER BY max_experience_years DESC;
SELECT name, email, experience_years FROM candidates WHERE suitability_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT role_name, max_experience_years FROM roles WHERE min_suitability_score < 0.5 ORDER BY max_experience_years ASC
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name ILIKE 'java%'
SELECT name, email, skills FROM candidates WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Python']
SELECT role_name, required_skills FROM roles WHERE 'Java' = ANY(required_skills)
